meanings.definition: The protection, backing, or support of a particular person or organization.
meanings.sent1: Under the aegis of her mentor, she felt safe and supported.
meanings.sent2: The company operates under the aegis of a larger corporation.
meanings.sent3: With the aegis of his lucky charm, he felt invincible in the game.
meanings.sent4: The aegis of her father's reputation shielded her from criticism.
meanings.sent5: The aegis of the law kept the town safe from criminals.

meanings.definition: A shield or breastplate emblematic of majesty that was associated with Zeus and Athena.
meanings.sent1: The warrior proudly displayed the aegis on his armor.
meanings.sent2: The aegis of the goddess Athena was adorned with a fearsome face.
meanings.sent3: The aegis shimmered in the sunlight, dazzling all who beheld it.
meanings.sent4: The king wore the aegis into battle, inspiring his troops with its majesty.
meanings.sent5: The aegis of Zeus was said to protect him from any harm.
